name: The One Power
tagline: Embrace saidar and let the One Power flow through you, now for Bukkit!
body:
TheOnePower
===========

Ever wanted to smash your enemies, using lightning bolts and fireballs? Ever wanted to be as cool as the Aes Sedai of Tar Valon? Now you are!

Features:
- Embrace Saidar and use the One Power!
- Weaves are created with a special inventory.
- New weaves often added.
- Ambition to include angreal, sa'angreal and ter'angreal, including a'dam.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
